https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iefVVtASZumO9saifio6ZmJbdi2.jpg On a boring Halloween night alone, teenager Michael Sphenson and his two best friends, Greg and Dave, make an adolescent bet that throws the night into blood-sucking terror. Die Now or Live Forever
